item.title: Areas of Exploration
item.description: These are the areas I’m planning to explore in Hacking Attention Storytelling Gamification Copywriting Video Creation Community Building Funnel Design Propaganda Design PSYOPs Experience Design Employee Engagement Building In Public Religious Leadership Toastmasters Public Speaking Stand up Comedy Magic Web3 Community Building Game design Email marketing Cold Email Marketing Influencers Negotiation Specialists Learning Design

item.title: Working Resoultion
item.description: In any situation, there is a threshold of information required for meaningful engagement, defined by the context in which we are operating.
